description: This table extracts the related multiple-response Heart Status Reasons (I HSB 30419) item.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode of care record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HR_STATUS_REASONS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason the patient was given the corresponding heart status value as defined by the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Exception


Veno-Arterial ECMO


Non-Dischargeable, Surgically Implanted, Non-Endovascular Biventricular Support Device


MCSD with Life-Threatening Ventricular Arrhythmia


Non-Dischargeable, Surgically Implanted, Non-Endovascular LVAD


Total Artificial Heart, BiVAD, RVAD, or VAD for Single Ventricle Patients


MCSD with Malfunction


Percutaneous Endovascular MCSD


Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump


Ventricular Tachycardia or Ventricular Fibrillation


Dischargeable LVAD for Discretionary 30 Days


Multiple Inotropes or a Single High Dose Inotrope and Hemodynamic Monitoring


MCSD with Hemolysis


MCSD with Pump Thrombosis


MCSD with Right Heart Failure


MCSD with Infection: Erythema and Pain with Leukocytosis or WBC Increase


MCSD with Infection: Debridement of the Driveline with Positive Cultures


MCSD with Infection: Bacteremia Treated with Antibiotics


MCSD with Infection: Recurrent Bacteremia from the Same Organism


MCSD with Infection: Positive Culture of Material from the Pump Pocket


MCSD with Mucosal Bleeding (Hospitalized Twice)


MCSD with Mucosal Bleeding (Hospitalized 3 Times)


MCSD with Aortic Insufficiency


Veno-Arterial ECMO after 7 Days


Non-Dischargeable, Surgically Implanted, Non-Endovascular LVAD after 14 Days


Percutaneous Endovascular MCSD after 14 Days


Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump after 14 Days


MCSD with Infection: Recurrent Debridement


MCSD with Life Threatening Ventricular Arrhythmia After 7 Days


Dischargeable LVAD without Discretionary 30 Days


Inotropes without Hemodynamic Monitoring


Congenital Heart Disease


Ischemic Heart Disease with Intractable Angina


Amyloidosis, or Hypertrophic or Restrictive Cardiomyopathy


Retransplant
